summary.span: 这是与相应的 COM 对象的互操作性的托管代码需要 COM coclass 中的主接口。

span.span: This is a primary interface in a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

summary.span: 仅当您想要使用的方法共享相同的名称的 COM 对象; 事件时，才使用此主接口在这种情况下，强制转换为此接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: Use this primary interface only when the method you want to use shares the same name as an event of the COM object; in this case, cast to this interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

summary.span: 否则，使用.NET 接口派生自 COM coclass 访问方法、 属性和事件的 COM 对象。

span.span: Otherwise, use the .NET interface that is derived from the COM coclass to access methods, properties, and events of the COM object.

summary.span: 有关 COM 对象的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the COM object, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Application

summary.span: 返回表示 Outlook application 对象的父对象。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the parent Outlook application for the object.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Categories As Categories

summary.span: 返回集合，代表所有类别定义的。

span.span: Returns a collection that represents all of the categories that are defined for the .

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 此属性是类似于属性对象，只不过此属性适用于会话配置文件指定一个或多个帐户，并指定帐户相关联，存储的类别，而类别NameSpace对象的属性应用于定义只有一个帐户，并指定该会话的主类别列表的会话配置文件。
对于如 IMAP 存储区某些辅助传递存储区， Categories属性返回的主存储区的Categories集合。IMAP 存储区实际上不支持单独的 categories 集合。

This property is similar to the property of the object, except that the this property applies to a session profile that specifies one or more accounts and specifies the categories for the store that an account is associated with, whereas the Categories property of the NameSpace object applies to a session profile that defines only one account, and specifies the Master Category List for that session.

For certain secondary delivery stores such as an IMAP store, the Categories property returns the Categories collection for the primary store. IMAP stores do not actually support a separate categories collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Class As OlObjectClass

summary.span: 返回常量，指示对象的类。

span.span: Returns an constant indicating the object's class.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayName As String
public: property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 表示的显示名称对象。

span.span: Returns a String (string in C#) representing the display name of the object.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: DisplayName是存储对象的默认属性。此属性对应于 MAPI 属性PidTagDisplayName。
DisplayName是只读的。若要更改DisplayName个人文件夹文件 (.pst)，请使用对象和方法。
DisplayName is the default property of the Store object. This property corresponds to the MAPI property, PidTagDisplayName.
DisplayName is read-only. To change the DisplayName of a Personal Folders File (.pst), use the object and the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ExchangeStoreType As OlExchangeStoreType

summary.span: 返回中的一个常量指示 Exchange 存储的类型的枚举。

span.span: Returns a constant in the enumeration that indicates the type of an Exchange store.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: ExchangeStoreType属性区分开来不同 Exchange 存储区类型，如主 Exchange 邮箱、 Exchange 邮箱、 公用文件夹存储或非 Exchange 存储区。此属性存储包括 Hotmail、 HTTP、 IMAP、 等的每个类型之间没有区别。使用类型的电子邮件帐户，如 Exchange、 HTTP、 IMAP 或 POP3 相关联的服务器。

The ExchangeStoreType property distinguishes among different Exchange store types, such as primary Exchange mailbox, Exchange mailbox, Public Folder store, or non-Exchange store. This property does not distinguish among every type of store including Hotmail, HTTP, IMAP, and so forth. Use for the type of server associated with an e-mail account, such as Exchange, HTTP, IMAP, or POP3.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FilePath As String
public: property System::String ^ FilePath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 个人文件夹文件 (.pst) 或脱机文件夹文件 (.ost) 存储中表示的完整文件路径。

span.span: Returns a String (string in C#) representing the full file path for a Personal Folders File (.pst) or an Offline Folder File (.ost) store.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 此属性支持 Exchange 和非 Exchange 存储区。如果该存储不.pst 或.ost 存储区， FilePath将返回空字符串。
This property supports both Exchange and non-Exchange stores. If the store is not a .pst or .ost store, FilePath returns an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.MAPIFolder GetDefaultFolder([in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlDefaultFolders FolderType) runtime managed
Public Function GetDefaultFolder (FolderType As OlDefaultFolders) As MAPIFolder

param.name: FolderType
param.span: 指定所请求默认文件夹的类型。

span.span: Specifies the type of the requested default folder.

summary.span: 返回对象的代表存储区中的默认文件夹且由指定的类型的参数。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the default folder in the store and that is of the type specified by the argument.

returns.span: 返回一个代表所请求的类型的默认文件夹的Folder对象。

span.span: Returns a Folder object that represents the default folder of the requested type.

returns.span: 如果不存在所请求的类型的默认文件夹， GetDefaultFolder将返回Nothing （中的空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing) C#）。

span.span: If the default folder of the requested type does not exist, GetDefaultFolder returns Nothing (a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) in C#).

span.para: 此方法类似于是方法对象。区别是此方法获取关联帐户后，传递存储区上的默认文件夹，而NameSpace对象的GetDefaultFolder上当前配置文件的默认存储区中返回的默认文件夹。
一个时GetDefaultFolder将返回Nothing （中的空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing) C#） 的示例是何时指定为但尚未部署托管文件夹组。

This method is similar to the method of the object. The difference is that this method gets the default folder on the delivery store that is associated with the account, whereas GetDefaultFolder of the NameSpace object returns the default folder on the default store for the current profile.
One example of when GetDefaultFolder returns Nothing (a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) in C#) is when is specified as the but the Managed Folders group has not been deployed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.MAPIFolder GetRootFolder() runtime managed

summary.span: 返回对象，表示的根级别文件夹。

span.span: Returns a object representing the root-level folder of the .

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

returns.span: 表示该 存储区 的根文件夹的 文件夹 对象。

span.span: A Folder object that represents the folder at the root of that Store.

span.para: GetRootFolder方法可用于枚举存储区的根文件夹的子文件夹。与不同其中包含当前配置文件中的所有存储区的所有文件夹、 Store.GetRootFolder.Folders允许您枚举中的当前配置文件的给定存储对象的所有文件夹。
的存储区的根文件夹的属性将返回字符串"Mapi"。
Exchange 公用文件夹的根文件夹存储区是公用文件夹的文件夹。此文件夹返回到 Application.Session.GetDefaultFolder(olPublicFoldersAllPublicFolders)。
如果服务提供程序不支持根文件夹， 则 GetRootFolder返回错误。

You can use the GetRootFolder method to enumerate the subfolders of the root folder of the Store. Unlike which contains all folders for all stores in the current profile, Store.GetRootFolder.Folders allows you to enumerate all folders for a given Store object in the current profile.
The property of the root folder of a store returns the string "Mapi".
The root folder for the Exchange Public Folder store is the folder Public Folders. This folder is returned by the call to Application.Session.GetDefaultFolder(olPublicFoldersAllPublicFolders).
GetRootFolder returns an error if the service provider does not support root folders.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.Rules GetRules() runtime managed

summary.span: 返回集合对象，它包含为当前会话定义的对象。

span.span: Returns a collection object that contains the objects defined for the current session.

returns.span: 针对当前会话定义的 规则 集合对象，该对象表示的一组 规则 。

span.span: A Rules collection object that represents the set of Rules defined for the current session.

span.para: 调用GetRules可能是操作会严重影响性能低速连接到 Exchange 服务器。
GetRules返回集合中的Rule对象的顺序遵循的与ExecutionOrder等于 1 正在第一个规则集合中， ExecutionOrder等于正在上次集合中的规则。
Calling GetRules can be an expensive operation in terms of performance on slow connections to an Exchange server.

The order of the Rule objects in the collection returned from GetRules follows that of with ExecutionOrder equal 1 being the first Rule in the collection and ExecutionOrder equal being the last Rule in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.Folders GetSearchFolders() runtime managed

summary.span: 返回集合对象，它代表搜索文件夹定义对象。

span.span: Returns a collection object that represents the search folders defined for the object.

returns.span: 表示 存储 对象的所有搜索文件夹的 文件夹 集合对象。

span.span: A Folders collection object that represents all the search folders for the Store object.

span.para: 存储， 则 GetSearchFolders返回所有可见的活动搜索文件夹。它并不返回未初始化或已清除的搜索文件夹。
Folders集合对象， 则 GetSearchFolders返回等于零 (0)，如果已存储不定义任何搜索文件夹。
表示集合的搜索文件夹的Folders集合对象的返回相同的对象。返回Nothing （中的空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing) C#）。
GetSearchFolders returns all the visible active search folders for the Store. It does not return uninitialized or aged out search folders.
GetSearchFolders returns a Folders collection object with equal zero (0) if no search folders have been defined for the Store.
For a Folders collection object that represents a collection of search folders, returns the same object as . returns Nothing (a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) in C#).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.MAPIFolder GetSpecialFolder([in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlSpecialFolders FolderType) runtime managed
Public Function GetSpecialFolder (FolderType As OlSpecialFolders) As MAPIFolder

param.name: FolderType
param.span: 在存储中的指定类型的特殊文件夹的 OlSpecialFolders 枚举常量。

span.span: A constant in the OlSpecialFolders enumeration that specifies the type of the special folder in the store.

summary.span: 返回对象由指定的特殊文件夹给定存储区中。

span.span: Returns a object for a special folder specified by in a given store.

returns.span: 一个代表由指定的特殊文件夹的Folder对象。

span.span: A Folder object that represents a special folder specified by the .

span.para: 所有存储区中存在所有特殊文件夹。 如果不存在所请求的特殊文件夹，将返回Nothing （中的空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing) C#）。
Not all special folders exist in all stores. If the requested special folder does not exist, Nothing (a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) in C#) will be returned.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCachedExchange As Boolean
public: property bool IsCachedExchange { bool get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个布尔(C# 中bool )，该值指示如果是缓存的 Exchange 存储区。

span.span: Returns a Boolean (bool in C#) that indicates if the is a cached Exchange store.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: IsCachedExchange返回True时是 （Store.ExchangeStoreType是olExchangePrimaryMailbox） 主 Exchange 邮箱和邮箱配置为使用缓存 Exchange 模式。它否则返回False 。具体而言，将返回False配置 Exchange 公用文件夹存储到缓存公用文件夹收藏夹。

IsCachedExchange returns True when is a primary Exchange mailbox (Store.ExchangeStoreType is olExchangePrimaryMailbox) and the mailbox is configured to use cached Exchange mode. It returns False otherwise. In particular, it returns False for an Exchange Public Folder store that is configured to cache Public Folder favorites.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsConversationEnabled As Boolean
public: property bool IsConversationEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 返回(bool的 C#) 值，该值为True如果存储区支持会话视图。

span.span: Returns a (bool for C#) value that is True if the store supports the Conversation view.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

remarks.span:
A 存储区支持会话视图，如果存储区为 POP、 IMAP 或 PST 存储区中，或者运行至少的 Microsoft Exchange Server 的版本 Microsoft Exchange Server 2010。存储区如果存储正在运行 Microsoft Exchange Server 2007 还支持对话视图，Outlook 版本至少是 Microsoft Outlook 2010 和 Outlook 中缓存模式下运行。如果存储区支持对话
，调用存储区中的项目的GetConversation方法返回项对象。如果存储区不支持对话， GetConversation返回Nothing （中的空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing) C#） 的存储区中的项目。

span.para: A store supports the Conversation view if the store is a POP, IMAP, or PST store, or if it runs a version of Microsoft Exchange Server that is at least Microsoft Exchange Server 2010. A store also supports the Conversation view if the store is running Microsoft Exchange Server 2007, the version of Outlook is at least Microsoft Outlook 2010, and Outlook is running in cached mode.

If a store supports conversations, calling the GetConversation method of an item in the store returns a object for the item. If the store does not support conversations, GetConversation returns Nothing (a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) in C#) for items in the store.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsDataFileStore As Boolean
public: property bool IsDataFileStore { bool get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个布尔(C# 中bool )，该值指示如果是 Outlook 数据文件，即个人文件夹文件 (.pst) 或脱机文件夹文件 (.ost) 存储区。

span.span: Returns a Boolean (bool in C#) that indicates if the is a store for an Outlook data file, which is either a Personal Folders File (.pst) or an Offline Folder File (.ost).

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: IsDataFileStore支持仅 Exchange 存储区，并将返回False ，对于 HTTP 类型存储，如 Hotmail 和 MSN 和 IMAP 存储区。
的 Exchange 存储区中，如果用户配置文件中未使用缓存 Exchange 模式IsDataFileStore将返回False 。IsDataFileStore还将返回False作为 Exchange 公用文件夹存储区时 (即，是olExchangePublicFolder)。
IsDataFileStore不指示是否对存储位于本地硬盘上。例如，无法映射的网络驱动器上位于.pst 文件和IsDataFileStore仍将返回True。
如果对用户配置的经典 Exchange 脱机模式下，可以更改IsDataFileStore的返回值。当用户处于脱机状态，并使用经典 Exchange 脱机模式， IsDataFileStore将返回True。当用户处于联机状态并且使用经典 Exchange online 模式， IsDataFileStore将返回False。
IsDataFileStore supports only Exchange stores, and will return False for HTTP-type stores such as Hotmail and MSN, and for IMAP stores.

For Exchange stores, IsDataFileStore will return False if the user profile is not using Cached Exchange mode. IsDataFileStore will also return False when the store is an Exchange Public Folder (that is, is olExchangePublicFolder).
IsDataFileStore does not indicate whether the store is located on a local hard drive. For example, a .pst file could be located on a mapped network drive and IsDataFileStore would still return True.

The return value of IsDataFileStore can change if the user is configured for classic Exchange offline mode. When the user is offline and using classic Exchange offline mode, IsDataFileStore will return True. When the user is online and using classic Exchange online mode, IsDataFileStore will return False.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsInstantSearchEnabled As Boolean
public: property bool IsInstantSearchEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 返回Boolean (C# 中bool )，该值指示是否即时搜索为已启用对存储操作。

span.span: Returns a Boolean (bool in C#) that indicates whether Instant Search is enabled and operational on a store.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 使用IsInstantSearchEnabled评估是否应使用ci_startswith或ci_phrasematch运算符在查询中。如果您使用ci_startswith或ci_phrasematch查询和即时搜索中未启用，则 Outlook 将返回错误。

Use IsInstantSearchEnabled to evaluate whether you should use ci_startswith or ci_phrasematch operators in your query. If you use ci_startswith or ci_phrasematch in the query and Instant Search is not enabled, Outlook will return an error.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsOpen As Boolean
public: property bool IsOpen { bool get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个布尔(C# 中bool )，该值指示如果处于打开状态。

span.span: Returns a Boolean (bool in C#) that indicates if the is open.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 此属性支持 Exchange 和非 Exchange 存储区。
IsOpen仅指示存储是否已打开。它不指示如果存储处于脱机状态，或者如果它是 Exchange 邮箱或 Exchange 公用文件夹和存储服务器已关闭。
打开存储可以实施性能开销，因为和和将打开存储如果尚未打开，您可以使用IsOpen决定之前调用GetRootFolder或则 GetSearchFolders最小化性能开销。
This property supports both Exchange and non-Exchange stores.
IsOpen only indicates if the store is open. It does not indicate if the store is offline, or if it is an Exchange mailbox or an Exchange Public Folder and the store server is down.

Because opening a store can impose a performance overhead, and and will open a store if it is not already open, you can use IsOpen before deciding to call GetRootFolder or GetSearchFolders to minimize performance overhead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RefreshQuotaDisplay() runtime managed

summary.span: 刷新资源管理器窗口的状态栏中显示的存储配额信息。

span.span: Refreshes the store quota information that is displayed in the status bar in the explorer window.

span.para: 如果存储区不支持配额信息的显示，则此方法没有任何影响。
If the store does not support the display of quota information, this method does nothing.

The Session property and the method can be used interchangeably to obtain the NameSpace object for the current session. Both members serve the same purpose. For example, the following pairs of statements perform the same function:

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StoreID As String
public: property System::String ^ StoreID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 标识。

span.span: Returns a String (string in C#) identifying the .

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: StoreID是唯一的配置文件。相当于 MAPI 属性PidTagStoreEntryId。
StoreID is unique to the profile. It is equivalent to the MAPI property PidTagStoreEntryId.
